Package com.blakfx.websocket

Class DeviceSessionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blakfx.websocket.DeviceSessionHandler
  • @ApplicationScoped
public class DeviceSessionHandler
extends Object
    Handles most of the work dispatched to it by the DeviceWebSocketServer. It keeps track of UserSessions, which consist of a session and a username, as well as all the active devices on the server, and provides operations for managing these.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private class  DeviceSessionHandler.UserSession
      Groups a session with an username, to allow for private messaging.

    • Field Summary

      (package private) static org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger log
      This class' Logger instance.

      The list of active user sessions on this server.

    • Method Detail

      • addSession

        public void addSession​(javax.websocket.Session session,
                       boolean useJSON)
        Adds the session to the user sessions list as a partially incomplete user session. It also creates all active devices from the device list on that session.
        Parameters:
        session - The session to add
        useJSON - Whether to use JSON or PB

      • bindUserToSession

        public void bindUserToSession​(String username,
                              javax.websocket.Session session)
        Binds a username to a session for a user session. Can fail if not unique username, or invalid session specified. The error is returned as part of the JSON message in its field.
        Parameters:
        username - The username to bind to the session
        session - The session to bind the username to

      • removeSession

        public void removeSession​(javax.websocket.Session session)
        Remove a session (and its containing user session).
        Parameters:
        session - The session to remove

      • getDevices

        public List<Device> getDevices()
        Get all active devices.
        Returns:
        List of all active devices

      • addDevice

        public void addDevice​(Device device,
                      boolean useJSON)
        Add a device, either via JSON or PB, and send it to all active sessions in the server.
        Parameters:
        device - The device to add
        useJSON - Whether to use JSON or PB

      • removeDevice

        public void removeDevice​(int id,
                         boolean useJSON)
        Remove a device, either via JSON or PB, and send its removal to all active sessions in the server.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the device to remove
        useJSON - Whether to use JSON or PB

      • toggleDevice

        public void toggleDevice​(int id,
                         boolean useJSON)
        Toggle a device, either via JSON or PB, and send its update to all active sessions on the server.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the device to toggle
        useJSON - Whether to use JSON or PB

      • dispatchChatMessage

        public void dispatchChatMessage​(javax.websocket.Session sender,
                                javax.json.JsonObject message)
        Dispatch a chat message, via JSON, from a specific sender. Global chat messages are dispatched here.
        Parameters:
        sender - The session that is sending the message.
        message - the contents to send

      • dispatchChatMessage

        public void dispatchChatMessage​(javax.websocket.Session sender,
                                DeviceProtocol.Device device)
        Dispatch a chat message, via PB, from a specific sender to the target specified in the message. Private chat messages are dispatched here.
        Parameters:
        sender - The session that is sending the message
        device - The content of the message

      • createChatMessage

        private javax.json.JsonObject createChatMessage​(javax.json.JsonObject msg,
                                                Boolean isSender)
        Create a global chat message, via JSON, to be sent in the JSON variant of dispatchChatMessage. Format the message as appropriate, depending on whether sender/receiver.
        Parameters:
        msg - The content to prepare the message with
        isSender - Whether intended for sender or receiver
        Returns:
        The chat message to send

      • createChatPBDevice

        private DeviceProtocol.Device createChatPBDevice​(DeviceProtocol.ChatMsg msg,
                                                 Boolean isSender,
                                                 String error)
        Create a private chat message, via PB, to be sent in the PB variant of dispatchChatMessage. Format the message as appropriate, depending on whether sender/receiver, and on whether file/text.
        Parameters:
        msg - The content to prepare the message with
        isSender - Whether intended for sender or receiver
        error - Contains the error if any, or empty if none
        Returns:
        The chat message to send

      • getDeviceById

        private Device getDeviceById​(int id)
        Get a device by its device ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the device to get
        Returns:
        the device with the specified id

        Parameters:

        Returns:
